0010111111010000 0100100100010111 0 -> sum: 0111100011100111, cout: 0

1000000000001100 0001100110110001 1 -> sum: 1001100110111110, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
